Reviews.Title: “Decent Stay in a Clean Hotel”

Reviews.Content: stayed july 2011 late review write review help planning stay arrived midnight flight delayed collected hire car stayed nights eleven night stay check smooth process initially booked booked paid booked expedia check gentleman kindly upgraded executive seeing child executive bigger separate living sofa bed staff bought luggage kindly converted sofa bed bed son sleep clean issues housekeeping bathroom clean issues hot water cleanliness found bed comfortable breakfast included stay personal opinion ok decent choice hotel ascot hotel sister hotel called royal ascot hotel door linked internally found staff friendly issues hotel busy main road building issues noise 2nd floor issue noise downside view royal ascot hotel building 10 yards view pleasing road meena bazaar cheap indian restaurants issues ta reports ladies night nor bar overall hotel suited day decent sleep suited

Reviews.Title: “Noise!!!!!”
Reviews.Author: Mark G
Reviews.Content: stayed wednesday morning breakfast kept 3 4 morning function 5th floor complaining reception stay night sleep service excellent apart nights sleep 1 am

Reviews.Title: “Nothing Special”
Reviews.Author: Annashapiro
Reviews.Content: 24hr lay dubai airline emirates customer service desk arranged hotel average hotel 20 min subway ride action near burj khalifa hallways smelled cigarettes low ceilings feel claustrophobic night fine stay elsewhere front desk staff helpful

Reviews.Title: “golden oldies”

Reviews.Content: husband 70 65 stayed hotel nights funny smell spacious apartment clean serviced daily sheets changed lifts breakfast food omelet front cook understand english ingredients easy ate night irish restaurant staff friendly cleaning males

Reviews.Title: “Noisey. Expect to be woken up at midnight and no sleep unitl 3am”
Reviews.Author: Rayb969
Reviews.Content: recently stayed 2 nights hotel level 3 front arrived approximately 11am travelling athens looking forward nights sleep unfortunately band restaurant 5th floor started midnight eventually stopped 3am reception night attire loud hear reception desk gentleman reception polite contact restaurant manager louder happened following night sleep significantly compromised management decision allow event recommend stay guarantee management web site suffer sleep deprivation

Reviews.Title: “DO NOT STAY AT THIS HOTEL.......”
Reviews.Author: Upupandawaymelbourne
Reviews.Content: intend sleep arrival hotel reception staff requested passports held hotel returned breakfast return time offered breakfast loud music coming nightclub hotel finished day cleaner leave replacement bath towels eventually supplied phone calls reception 3rd night nightclub life 1100pm loud thumping continuous music complaining reception told ill manager music finish received return phone call complained guest services person anastasia details surprised lack attention night reception staff surprised offered dont moving helped situation music loud heard abu anastasia appeared sympathetic complaint informed contacting hotel manager email especially requested refund price 1 night confirmed sent email manager inform update request needless words cheap time left hotel 1145pm night information anastasia hotel manager relation matter recommend hotel particularly senior citizens families ok teenie boppers rave lay hotel wifi cost 35 dirhams 2 hours 60 dirhams 24 hours

Reviews.Title: “smelt really bad....”
Reviews.Author: annerr59
Reviews.Content: stopover 2 nights european holiday soon walked 3 am morning damp musky smell evident reception night noisy party floor 3 am rang reception tell manager changed recommend hotel bad smell hotel worst stayed review tripadvisor warn travellers

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel in heart of 'old Dubai'.”
Reviews.Author: AetMenvacances
Reviews.Content: husband recently spent night ascot hotel hotel roomy separate cupboards meaning usual amount hanging space hotel neither blown little niggled example tea coffee facilities moreover bathroom limited toiletries offered shampoo body wash accessible via dispenser shower space individual bottle lend slightly cheaper air hotel hope mentioned loud music rumbling hotel arrived 1am morning shut bedroom door couldnt hear dont appear views looked alley housing hotel appear restaurants eat hotel breakfast fine ascot flush royal ascot guests ascot able royal pool spa facilities husband enjoyed evening swim rooftop pool followed cocktails rooftop chill bar enjoyed hot day sightseeing staff hotel friendly helpful complaints regard solid 354 star hotel earth shattering prefer stay else time

Reviews.Title: “More than adequate, just not luxury”

Reviews.Content: located gold spice souks exchange rates building parking lot vacant lots door atm building 2 mins walk stays separate lounge bigger lounge chair clean tidy friendly reception staff helpful nice restaurant breakfast mod cons sister hotel royal ascot adjoining able avail ourselves facilities pool gym etc stay beds

Reviews.Title: “Reasonable hotel for short stay”
Reviews.Author: lynnandystalbans
Reviews.Content: hotel nicely furnished bathroom fitted particularly wobbly toilet taps didnt reach basin typical struck dark lit 2 bedside lamps standard corner heavy orange shades barely read frustrating hotels charge internet access dislike charge water surely courtesy gesture breakfast plenty choice helpful staff restaurants overpriced pool door royal ascot lovely ive stayed royal recommend ascot

Reviews.Content: worst reception staff checked 3am clerk insists check time 12am day explain past midnight confirmation check 2am passports check kept passports ready hour police clearance send morning insisted minute passports returned extremely reminded cheaper hotels london pokey furniture bad odours complimentary bottled water furniture dated hotel smells bad wall plugs built furniture night club hotel cant sleep till 3 am staff unfriendly own priorities normally hotel doors bell boy guests lift allow lift carry bring luggage lift ascot bell boy feet whatever manner luggage trolley lift thereby else little corner breakfast basic recommend hotel management send staff training drastically bad condition hotel
